QuestData.Title: Friend of the Exarchs
QuestData.Description: Only three members remain of the Exarch Council, but we are all deeply indebted to you. The vote is unanimous: Your Alliance will have our full support on Draenor.$b$bWe are also going to place a draenei representative under your direct command. Three potential candidates are here in the courtyard. Speak to them and choose who you want - we will dispatch him or her immediately to your garrison!
QuestData.LogDescription: Choose a follower (either Andren, Chel, or Onaala) and then speak with Exarch Naielle.
QuestData.CompletionText: Who are you going to pick, $n?
QuestData.RewardText: An excellent choice! We'll send your pick directly to your garrison to help with any missions you encounter.$b$bNow, about those supplies you requested...
